alert.note: Alert for Leslie; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 6:57PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Leslie and central Perry Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 656 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wendover, or over Hyden, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cinda and Cutshin around 700 PM EDT. Hyden around 705 PM EDT. Smilax and Thousandsticks around 710 PM EDT. Daley around 715 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Wooton, Dryhill, Frew, Kaliopi, Avawam and Toulouse. THIS INCLUDES Hal Rogers Parkway between mile markers 43 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
